channel.title: Need help making an npc talk
channel.description: hey will you please help me because when i add a new npc to my server how do i make it talk?????

item.title: Need help making an npc talk
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:9, topic:262807”][quote author=rash link=topic=347054.msg2673225#msg2673225 date=1234914473]

i think he means how do you make them speak, not dialouge.

npchandler.java

NPCHandler class.

.java idiot

NPCHandler class = NPCHandler.java

Idiot.

he cant edit the .class can he?

not unless he decompiles it.

idiot.
[/quote]
Did I say NPCHandler.class? No.
I said NPCHandler class.[/quote]

I misread.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help making an npc talk
